actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code, so as to provide that hospital and medical care shall be provided under such title to any veteran of any war.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs, within the limits of Veterans' Administration facilities, to furnish hospital and medical care to any veteran of any war. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 610, 612)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code, so as to provide that hospital and medical care shall be provided under such title to any veteran of any war.
